EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}} with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}}.
If you want to check out the replay again, please visit our Turbonomic 6.1 On-Demand Webinar Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/6-1-video-content]]>.
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> with us.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
